Description: Ivory shabti with a lappet-wig and a modelled face; one hand remains holding two hoes and a seed-bag; the front of the leg section was originally inscribed.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:29/313 The North Suburb, the South Western Quarter, enclosure of houses T.36.13,20,27,30, northern end, brick-lined storehole.
Curator's comments: Frankfort & Pendlebury, City of Akhenaten 2:54, pl. XXXV, fig.7.
Condition: incomplete - left side of body lost
